resources.string:
Start/stop Taskbar: {fou_social-windows} + M {fou_magnifying-glass} + M

Lock device: {fou_social-windows} + L {fou_magnifying-glass} + L

Show start menu: {fou_social-windows} {fou_magnifying-glass}
(requires Taskbar to be set as the assist app in Settings)

Start/stop Taskbar
• WinKey+M / Search+M

Lock device
• WinKey+L / Search+L

Show start menu
• WinKey / Search
(requires Taskbar to be set as the assist app in Settings)
